CustomField.description: Comma separated field API names to query. The first field is the primary (i.e. Name), and the others are secondary (i.e. BillingCity, BillingState). Up to 255 characters.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma separated field API names to query. The first field is the primary (i.e. Name), and the others are secondary (i.e. BillingCity, BillingState). Up to 255 characters.
CustomField.label: Name Field API Name
